ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A class in which you discuss the larger world-historical trends seen in contemporary affairs, using Kissinger's writings.

This was an incredible course that gave me the opportunity to think deeply about some of the biggest questions that face us as humans. This class was one of few that I have taken that was really about my education and making me think and grow as a person.
This is a course that will ask you to actually think. It will not be about reiterating arguments or finding the footnote; it will be about the biggest, most difficult questions.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This is not about a profession or a discipline. It is about learning how to look at the world.
